Posts.Content: May 18, 2011 08:11AM faithlmisjw wrote: Hi, Christine: I had similar dignose as you back in 2008. I was 42 years old with a 10 year old child. I opted for mastectomy since the size of my DCIS was quite large (5 cm).  No radiation for me.  Nowdays, I see my oncologist twice a year since I am on Tamoxifen for 5 years.  I did went back to see my surgeon once since I found another lump near the surgical area, it turned out to be scar tissues.  Take care of yourself.
Posts.Title: Just Diagonosed with High Grade DCIS WorkingMom10 mommyrnx2
